body.name: Butterfly Water Bottle with Straw Lid 32oz - Reusable Water Bottles, BPA Free Leakproof Water Flask for Travel Fitness Sports
features: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL:This water bottle is made of high-quality food-grade environmentally friendly reusable copolyester plastic, without BPA, ensuring healthy drinking, durable and drop-prooftransparent frosted bottle will make you fall in love with it.
Function DESING: The bottle cap and straw design are combined together and can be folded for storage.Equipped with polyethylene straws Safe and harmless, easy to drink water.

PRACTICAL DESIGN: The translucent sports water bottle allows you to see how much water you use each day. Reminds you to stay hydrated and drink enough water to better achieve your fitness goals, including weight loss, appetite control and overall health.

PORTABLE: 10.4 * 3inch. This sports water bottle can hold 1000ml / 32oz of water, wide handle, easy to carry, there is a removable lanyard, two ways to carry, Perfect choice for fitness, gym, running, hiking, cycling, camping, and any other indoor outdoor sports.
PERSONALIZED DIY printing: Each of our sports water bottles is printed with a different HD pattern, and there is always one that will be your favorite.It is also a great gift for you.
body.description: SpecificationMaterial: copolyester plasticCapacity: 32oz (1000ml)Size: 10.4X3 inchSports water bottle is equipped with polyethylene straw, safe, non-toxic, no deformation, easy to drinkSports water bottle is light and easy to carry, with wide handle position, can be easily lifted by two fingersUsage:Minors should use it under the guidance of adults or after being notifiedRinse the cup with neutral detergent in warm water before useTo prevent leakage,please tighten the lid clockwise when the cup is tiltedNOTE：The cup should not be over full when adding boiling water to prevent overflow and scaldingAvoid direct heating or high temperature. Do not heat the products in open fires, microwave ovens, induction stoves or dishwashersDo not add dry ice, carbonated drinks and other liquids that are prone to high pressure in the vacuum cup, Do not add soy sauce, soup containing alkaline, acidic components of the liquid, so as to avoid the cup body corrosionWhen cleaning, please use neutral detergent and warm water. Do not use alkaline bleach, chemical dishcloth and other cleaning agentsAfter loading into milk and other perishable drinks, please drink and clean as soon as possible, so as not to spoil and rot the inner bladder
